basic example.good string: This has a [link][0] that will stay put
basic example.good string with repeated link: This has a [link][0] but the link [repeats][1]
basic example.added redactable content: This has a [link][0] and will have redactable content added as another [link](example2.com)
basic example.reused redaction: This has a [link][0] and will add a redaction with the same index [link number 2][0]
basic example.manufactured redaction: This has a [link][0] and will add a redaction with a different index [made up link][1]
basic example.malformed redaction: This [link] [0] redaction will have broken formatting
